content:
### New nodes
#### Adalo Adalo is a low code app builder. Refer to n8n's [Adalo node documentation](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.adalo.md) for more information.
#### Google Cloud Storage n8n now has a [Google Cloud Storage node](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.googlecloudstorage.md).
#### Gmail Trigger n8n now has a [Gmail Trigger node](/integrations/builtin/trigger-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.gmailtrigger/index.md). This allows you to trigger workflows in response to a Gmail account receiving an email.
